title: an additional entitlement, governed by the size of the plot under redevelopment, in accordance with
clause_text: an additional entitlement, governed by the size of the plot under redevelopment, in accordance with the Table-A below: - Explanation: (a) The plot under redevelopment means the land demarcated by MHADA for redevelopment.
section: 33(5)Development/Redevelopment of Housing Schemes of Maharashtra Housing & Area Development Authority (MHADA)
